pullRequest.title: Deck Description: Handle Newlines
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose / Description Previously, a newline was converted into a space, whereas Anki Desktop handles a newline as a newline. Fixes Fixes #5188 Approach We convert newlines to
tags, so context.fromHtml converts them to newlines. How Has This Been Tested? Unit tested and tested on my Android. Before: After: After matches Anki Desktop. It has a scrollbar if necessary. Checklist You have not changed whitespace unnecessarily (it makes diffs hard to read) You have a descriptive commit message with a short title (first line, max 50 chars). Your code follows the style of the project (e.g. never omit braces in if statements) You have commented your code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas You have performed a self-review of your own code

commit.message:
Deck Description: Handle Newlines Fixes #5188 Previously, a newline was converted into a space, whereas Anki Desktop handles a newline as a newline. We convert newlines to
tags, so context.fromHtml converts them to spaces.

nodes.bodyText: Match more? https://stackoverflow.com/a/13286456 (also note it should be case insensitive - does upstream have an example of this? The recent mathjax PRs show an example of harmonizing regex with AnkiDesktop for replacement purposes - usually we can make it so our pattern almost exactly matches theirs even in style)
